name: Unreal Tournament 2004
notes:
Recent GOG installer required (v2 or above). 
If you have graphical issues, try the Direct3D renderer from the settings in-game or by deleting UT2004.ini in the game's System folder, to reset to the default configuration.

files.game: N/A:Select the game's setup file downloaded from GOG.

content:
files:
- game: N/A:Select the game's setup file downloaded from GOG.
game:
  arch: win32
  exe: drive_c/GOG Games/Unreal Tournament 2004/System/UT2004.exe
  prefix: $GAMEDIR
installer:
- task:
    arch: win32
    description: Creating Wine prefix
    name: create_prefix
    prefix: $GAMEDIR
- task:
    app: windowmanagermanaged=n
    name: winetricks
    prefix: $GAMEDIR
- task:
    executable: game
    name: wineexec
    prefix: $GAMEDIR
- write_config:
    file: $GAMEDIR/drive_c/GOG Games/Unreal Tournament 2004/System/UT2004.ini
    key: RenderDevice
    section: Engine.Engine
    value: OpenGLDrv.OpenGLRenderDevice
- write_config:
    file: $GAMEDIR/drive_c/GOG Games/Unreal Tournament 2004/System/UT2004.ini
    key: CacheSizeMegs
    section: Editor.EditorEngine
    value: 64
wine:
  version: tkg-4.2-x86_64
